arts.ttl: England? Denmark? Germany? Monaco’s proflific forward Mika Biereth evokes international future
arts.sum: Mika Biereth (22) has hit the ground running at AS Monaco. Since making the move from Sturm Graz for €13m at the start of January, the centre-forward has 10 goals…

arts.ttl: Mika Biereth scores third hat trick this month in Monaco win over Reims
arts.sum: Biereth scored his third hat trick of the month when Monaco beat Reims 3-0 in Ligue 1 on Friday. Monaco rose above Lille and into fourth place in Ligue 1, equal on points with third-placed Nice, which has a game in hand.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Monaco 3-0 Reims: Mika Biereth nets third hat-trick as Monégasques return to winning ways
arts.sum: Ligue 1 McDonald’s, Round 24, 28/02/25 Mika Biereth netted his third hat-trick in as many home games in Ligue 1 as AS Monaco swept aside a lethargic Stade de Reims…

arts.ttl: Criminal proceedings against AS Monaco owner Dmitry Rybolovlev dropped
arts.sum: Criminal proceedings brought against AS Monaco owner Dmitry Rybolovlev and his lawyer, Tetiana Bersheda, have been annulled by order of the Monaco Court of Appeal. The proceedings against Rybolovlev and…

arts.ttl: Reims predicted XI v Monaco: Cédric Kipré out, Junya Ito to start
arts.sum: Cédric Kipré is still suspended for Stade de Reims as they look to put their long winless run to an end when they face AS Monaco at the Stade Louis…

arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v Reims: Adi Hütter to revert to 4-4-2?
arts.sum: AS Monaco, looking to bounce back from their 2-1 defeat to Lille OSC last weekend, could revert to a 4-4-2 when they host Stade de Reims on Friday evening. In…

Monaco, currently fifth with 40 points, are looking to get back on track after a 2-1 defeat against Lille. Despite some inconsistency in the league, one of their key players, Mika Biereth, has been in...

arts.ttl: Reims struggle to arrest the slide as relegation fears heighten
arts.sum: A side that were European contenders heading into the international break last November may not even be in Ligue 1 by the end of the season. Such is the turn…
